Description: Podio supplies a web-based platform for organizing team communication, business processes, data and content in project management workspaces according to project needs.
Name: Podio

Methods.Name: List New Opportunities
Methods.Description: Lists opportunities created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Opportunities
Methods.Description: Lists opportunities updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Opportunities
Methods.Description: Lists all opportunities.

Methods.Name: List New Partners
Methods.Description: Lists partners created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Partners
Methods.Description: Lists all partners.

Methods.Name: List Updated Partners
Methods.Description: Lists partners updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Apps
Methods.Description: Lists the apps associated with this account.

Methods.Name: Get App Fields
Methods.Description: Gets the definition of an app fields.

Methods.Name: Create Leads
Methods.Description: Creates an item for a specified app.

Methods.Name: List Calls
Methods.Description: Lists all calls.

Methods.Name: List New Calls
Methods.Description: Lists calls logged since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Communications
Methods.Description: Lists all communications.

Methods.Name: List New Communications
Methods.Description: Lists communications created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Communications
Methods.Description: Lists communications updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Seller Leads
Methods.Description: Lists all seller leads.

Methods.Name: List New Seller Leads
Methods.Description: Lists seller leads created since the last run.

Methods.Name: Create Seller Lead
Methods.Description: Creates a new seller lead.

Methods.Name: List Webforms
Methods.Description: Lists all webforms, optionally filtered by a specific View ID.

Methods.Name: List New Webforms
Methods.Description: Lists webforms created since the last run, optionally filtered by a specific View ID.

Methods.Name: List Opportunities V2
Methods.Description: Lists all opportunities, optionally filtered by a specific View ID.

Methods.Name: List New Opportunities V2
Methods.Description: Lists opportunities created since the last run, optionally filtered by a specific View ID.

Methods.Name: List New Seller Leads V2
Methods.Description: Lists seller leads created since the last run.

Methods.Name: Create Seller Lead V2
Methods.Description: Creates a new seller lead.
